remarks: Two ways of saying a relation is transitive.  Special instance of ~ cotr2g .  (Contributed by RP, 22-Mar-2020.)
statement:
cotr2.a $e |- dom R C_ A $.
cotr2.b $e |- ( dom R i^i ran R ) C_ B $.
cotr2.c $e |- ran R C_ C $.
cotr2 $p |- ( ( R o. R ) C_ R <-> A. x e. A A. y e. B A. z e. C ( ( x R y /\ y R z ) -> x R z ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B y z $.
$d C z $.
$d R x y z $.
